articles.title: Greetings to Belgian King
articles.content:
Greetings to Belgian King
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Albert 2, king of Belgium, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message wished the king and people of Belgium prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Honored with Order Commemorating 60th Anniversary of Victory in FLW
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Honored with Order Commemorating 60th Anniversary of Victory in FLW
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- A decree was promulgated by the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on July 10 on awarding Order Commemorating the 60th Anniversary of the Victory in the Fatherland Liberation War (FLW) to the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung.
					 The decree said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung was an invincible iron-willed commander and a legendary hero for all ages as he led the FLW to victory to defend the freedom and independence of the country.
					
					 He aroused all the service personnel and people to the do-or-die decisive battle against U.S. imperialism through his historic radio speech during the war and put forth original strategies, tactics and war methods in every period and at every stage of the war to overpower the enemies' numerical and technical superiority by political and ideological, strategic and tactical superiority.
					
					 He won victory after victory in the acute showdown with imperialism and the U.S. and turned the DPRK into an invincible socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in defence, holding aloft the banner of Juche and Songun for decades since the end of the war.
					
					 The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK confers Order Commemorating the 60th Anniversary of the Victory in the FLW upon Kim Il Sung, in reflection of the unanimous will and desire of all the service personnel and people, on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the war.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Awarded Order Commemorating 60th Anniversary of Victory in FLW
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Awarded Order Commemorating 60th Anniversary of Victory in FLW
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- A  decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on awarding the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il Order Commemorating the 60th Anniversary of the Victory in the Fatherland Liberation War (FLW) was promulgated on July 10.
					 The decree said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the Songun commander of Mt. Paektu and peerless patriot who smashed the imperialist reactionaries' moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK with the might of Songun for more than half a century and made the history and tradition of winning a victory in the war shine century after century.
					
					 He grasped the Juche-based military idea and war methods of President Kim Il Sung at the operational table of the Supreme Command in his teens. Accompanying the President during journeys for Songun leadership, he remarkably developed the Korean People's Army into the army of the leader and the Workers' Party of Korea and wisely led the struggle to implement the party's military line.
					
					 He formulated the Songun politics as the main political mode under socialism, thus providing a powerful treasured sword for defending the country and waging the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle. He wrought astonishing miracles by bringing a lot of events to be specially recorded in the history of the Korean nation spanning 5 000 years.
					
					 The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK confers Order Commemorating the 60th Anniversary of the Victory in FLW upon Kim Jong Il, reflecting the unanimous will and desire of all service personnel and people of the country on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the war.

articles.title: KCNA Delegation Leaves to Visit Russia
articles.content:
KCNA Delegation Leaves to Visit Russia
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- A KCNA delegation headed by Vice-Director General Ri Kwan Sam left here Saturday to visit Russia.
					 It was seen off at the airport by Ri Ho Gyu, vice-director general of the KCNA, and a staff member of the Russian embassy here.

articles.title: Romanian Party Delegation Here
articles.content:
Romanian Party Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Socialist Party of Romania led by Chairman of the Supreme Council Vasile Orleanu arrived here Saturday to participate in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: Monument to Fallen Fighters of KPA Renovated
articles.content:
Monument to Fallen Fighters of KPA Renovated
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The monument to the fallen fighters of the Korean People's Army located on Namsan Hill in Wonsan, Kangwon Province has been renovated on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean People's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The monument consists of pedestal, gatepost, wreath-laying stand and plaza.
					
					 Portrayed on the pedestal are embossed with a cap-badge of the Korean People's Army, a rifle and the red flag and before them stand group sculptures depicting soldiers of the Ground Force, Navy and Air and Anti-Air Force of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Figures reading "June 25, 1950", "July 27, 1953" are inscribed on the gatepost and Hero Ri Su Bok's poem "For My Only Motherland" is inscribed on the grave stone in the plaza.
					
					 Buried under the pedestal are remains of fallen fighters of the KPA who died heroic deaths on the battle fields during the Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Show to Be Held in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Show to Be Held in Pyongyang
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- A Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia show will take place here on July 24-29 in celebration of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953).
					 It will bring together more than 70 entities from the army, commissions, ministries, national institutions as well as overseas Korean organizations.
					
					 It can be also attended by foreign groups, diplomatic missions, international agencies and non-governmental organizations here.
					
					 The show will take place under the theme "July 27, War Victory Day Blessed with Flowers of the Sun".
					
					 Designing for the show venue has already been prepared while the show posters have come off the press.
					
					 The pavilions will be decorated as reminders of the undying feats President Kim Il Sung performed in winning the war against the U.S. imperialists and the feats leader Kim Jong Il performed in leading the Songun (military-first) revolution.
					
					 Potted Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia flowers, to be put on display at the show, are under cultivation with great care by many entities, including the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, Ministry of Foreign Trade, Ministry of Metallurgical Industry and the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps.

articles.title: Int'l Events Will Mark DPRK's War Victory Day
articles.content:
Int'l Events Will Mark DPRK's War Victory Day 
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- International solidarity events will take place here in Pyongyang and local areas of the DPRK on July 24 and 25 to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War (Korean War). 
					 A grand international march for peace will be held demanding the conclusion of a DPRK-U.S. peace treaty and withdrawal of the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK and supporting the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea. 
					
					 An international meeting will also take place to denounce the atrocities committed by the GIs during the Korean War. 
					
					 Those events will be co-sponsored by the Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea and the Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People. They will bring together delegations and delegates of organizations for friendship and solidarity in different countries, international organizations and other foreign guests and overseas Koreans.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Censures U.S. Moves to Build Missile Shield in Asia-Pacific
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Censures U.S. Moves to Build Missile Shield in Asia-Pacific 
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is busy stepping up its moves to build a missile shield in the Asia-Pacific region under the pretext of the missile threat from the DPRK.
					 The U.S. Department of Defense announced that it would push ahead with its plan to additionally deploy 14 interceptor missiles in its west coastal areas including Alaska and California, despite the recent failure in the test-fire of long-range interceptor missiles to cope with the missile attack of the DPRK.
					
					 It is deceiving the international community, claiming that the interceptor missiles to be deployed in Alaska is to "cope with the missile development of north Korea", not to target its neighboring powers.
					
					 This is a brigandish logic that cannot convince anyone and a broad hoax to evade the world criticism. 
					
					 The U.S. moves to establish a missile defense system (MD) in the Asia-Pacific region is a clear indication of its sinister intention to contain the powers and maintain and further strengthen its military hegemony in the region.
					
					 Viktor Yesin, former chief of the General Staff of the Strategic Rocket Force of Russia, said that "the U.S. is building a theatre missile defense system to contain the nuclear potential of Russia and China and its reaction to the DPRK is totally asymmetric".
					
					 The U.S. is pushing ahead with its MD in a bid to stifle the DPRK any time and to contain the regional powers.
					
					 This MD operational range covers the powers and the strategic vantage points in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The U.S. moves to build a missile shield is, in essence, the establishment of a powerful missile attack system to target the Eurasian continent.
					
					 Precisely for this reason the U.S. is now boosting cooperation with Japan and south Korea in building a combined missile shield. 
					
					 Japan, which got a permission for joint development, production and deployment of MD from the U.S., deployed lots of new-type missiles in bases of its "Self-defense Force" and expanding the operational range of its Aegis interceptor missile warships beyond the limits of its maritime sovereignty, stepping up the introduction of the MD. 
					
					 Under the pretext of the combined MD the U.S. allowed the south Korean puppet forces to increase their missile range so that they can target any areas in the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. missile shield is being built in the direction of pressurizing the potential rivals in the Asia-Pacific region from the east and west.
					
					 These U.S. moves are triggering off military concern among the regional powers and sparking confrontation and arms race in the region.
					
					 Its scenario to establish a hegemonic order in the Asia-Pacific region on the basis of upper hand of strength is bound to go bust as it is an anachronistic one.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage Field Mobile Drills
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage Field Mobile Drills
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The 26th motorized infantry division of the south Korean puppet army is mulling staging large-scale field mobile drills in the areas of Yangju, Tongduchon, Phochon and Ryonchon, Kyonggi Province and Cholwon, south Korean Kangwon Province, from July 22 to 26, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 It was reported that operation equipment and vehicles belonging to the division would be hurled into the drills.

articles.title: South Korean Authorities Denounced for Dangerous War Moves
articles.content:
South Korean Authorities Denounced for Dangerous War Moves
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy and other public organizations in south Korea had the 166th peace action for independent reunification on Tuesday.
					 The speakers said a peace treaty has not been concluded though 60 years have passed since the ceasefire, adding that this is mainly attributable to the U.S. persistent hostile policy towards the north.
					
					 The "northern limit line" claimed by the "government" has no validity in view of international law as it was drawn by the U.S. unilaterally, the organizations charged, and went on:
					
					 The conservative forces, however, are working hard to turn the West Sea of Korea into a powder magazine, insisting it is their "territorial line".
					
					 The Intelligence Service's case clearly indicates that the authorities abused the "northern limit line" for their political purpose.
					
					 The organizations appealed to the public to join people of various circles in their actions to hold in check the dangerous military provocations leading to an all-out war on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Protests against Authorities' Action
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Protests against Authorities' Action
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held a press conference on July 18 denouncing the puppet regime for persistently refusing the transfer of the right to control wartime operations.
					 At the conference, the organization recalled the fact that Minister of Defense Kim Kwan Jin asked the U.S. secretary of Defense to postpone again the period for the transfer of the right scheduled for 2015.
					
					 This is, in fact, a revelation of the selfish intention of the military authorities to permanently give up the military sovereignty and draw water to their mill by maintaining the status quo, the organization noted, adding:
					
					 This means the present chief executive has reneged on her election commitment to take over the right to control wartime operations by 2015.
					
					 The organization demanded the authorities terminate the humiliating relations with the U.S. and completely dismantle the south Korea-U.S. "Combined Forces Command" and the "UN Command".

articles.title: University Teachers Brand IS's Interference in Election as Unpardonable Crime
articles.content:
University Teachers Brand IS's Interference in Election as Unpardonable Crime
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- 128 teachers of Seoul National University held a press conference in Seoul on Wednesday at which they made public a declaration on the situation calling on the regime to conduct a thoroughgoing investigation into the Intelligence Service (IS) interference in the "presidential election".
					 They in the declaration branded such act as an unpardonable crime.
					
					 They also noted that opening to public the 2007 minutes of the inter-Korean summit by the IS was another illegal action.
					
					 The declaration noted that the ceaseless issue of declarations on the situation by people from all walks of life and the candlelight rallies being staged in different parts of south Korea indicate that the issues of probing the truth about the IS's illegal interference in the election and the punishment of those involved in the action are an urgent demand of the times.
					
					 Those teachers said that they respond to the calls of all south Korean people desirous of democracy, adding: The IS's meddling in the election was a serious criminal action.
					
					 The "National Assembly" should make an investigation into the action and probe the truth about it at an early date, they noted, and went on:
					
					 The prosecution should conduct a thoroughgoing investigation into those who were involved in planning and carrying out the operation and punish all of them.
					
					 The former chief of the Seoul District Police Agency and others who tried to play down the truth about the case should be severely punished.

articles.title: S. Korean Ruling Party Flayed for Its Artifice to Prevent Investigation into IS's Meddling in Election
articles.content:
S. Korean Ruling Party Flayed for Its Artifice to Prevent Investigation into IS's Meddling in Election
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea on July 17 made public a statement denouncing the "Saenuri Party" for its artifice to prevent  an investigation into the Intelligence Service's meddling in the election.
					 The statement assailed the "Saenuri Party" for claiming that the state investigation into the IS's meddling in the election has not been made due to legislators from the Democratic Party of south Korea.
					
					 It is well known to everybody that the "Saenuri Party" is not willing to push ahead with the probe into the case of the IS, the statement noted.
					
					 The ruling party is employing such trite sleight of hand as disabling the opposition party through combination of threat and far-fetched assertion and fabricating a new case to divert elsewhere the people's criticism of the ruling party, it charged.
					
					 The statement called on all progressive forces to wage an unflinching struggle against the moves of the ruling party to quell the candlelight actions against the IS.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Media
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Foreign media dedicated special write-ups or special programs to the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The July 12th issue of the Kuwaiti newspaper Al-Rai carried an article titled "President Kim Il Sung, great man in the century" illustrated with a portrait of the smiling President.
					
					 The article said:
					
					 His august name is more deeply enshrined in the minds of the Korean people and world progressives as time passes.
					
					 He made great contributions to the Korean revolution and global independence with his outstanding and seasoned leadership.
					
					 He was the most outstanding politician and state leader in the 20th century.
					
					 The July 1-15th issue of the Lao newspaper Saonum Lao carried a special write-up titled "Kim Il Sung, eternal President of the DPRK" illustrated with a portrait of the smiling President and the Pakistani newspaper Baluchistan Times on July 7 carried an article titled "Father of the people".
					
					 The domestic radio broadcasting service of Guinea on July 8 said that progressive humankind is highly praising Kim Il Sung as the eternal sun of Juche, introducing in detail the fact that he founded the immortal idea guiding the cause of independence and made a great contribution to the human cause of independence.
					
					 It stressed that the idea and cause of the President have been successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The international broadcasting service and seven national languages broadcasting service of Guinea aired the similar program.
					
					 The radio and TV broadcasting services of Equatorial Guinea on July 8 aired programs highly praising the sacred revolutionary career of the President.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Pakistani Figure
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Pakistani Figure
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Haji Mohammad Said, secretary general of the Pakistan Labour Federation, issued a statement on July 13 on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 He said that the President was the leader of the Korean people and the world progressive peoples.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung founded the immortal Juche idea in the early period of his revolutionary activities.
					
					 He devoted all his life to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people and performed undying exploits for carrying out the socialist cause.
					
					 We highly praise him for struggling to defend Korean socialism from the offensive of imperialism.
					
					 His life was an encyclopedic one for the development of the human cause of independence.
					
					 He not only frustrated the imperialists' moves against socialism but also energetically led the Korean people's struggle for the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 We highly praise him for making sure that socialist policies such as the free medical care and free education were enforced and the monumental edifices for the happiness of the people built.
					
					 He made a great contribution to the cause of socialism.
					
					 His exploits will always be remembered by the Korean people and progressive mankind.

articles.title: Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Show Held in China
articles.content:
Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Show Held in China
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- A Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia show took place in Dalian, China on July 12 to mark the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Displayed in the center of the venue of the show were a hundred potted flowers praising the great men against the background of a large art work depicting the main sculpture "Victory" of the Monument to the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Displayed there were photos introducing diplomas and gold medals awarded to Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia at international festivals.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony of the show were public figures of all social strata and masses in Dalian City. Present there on invitation were officials of the DPRK consulate general in Shenyang and Koreans working in Dalian.
					
					 The chairman of the Dalian Floriculturists Association recalled that the armies and peoples of the two countries defeated the U.S. imperialists in the Korean war in firm unity, adding that he will make positive efforts to steadily develop the friendship between China and DPRK in the future too.
					
					 The secretary general of the association said that Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia are immortal flowers reflecting the ardent reverence of the progressives for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He noted that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries which were provided and developed by the leaders of the elder generation of the two countries would shed more brilliant rays along with history.
					
					 The general manager of a Chinese company expressed his will to learn from the experience gained in cultivating Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia and thus actively disseminate them not only in China but in various countries of the world.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered by UK Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered by UK Organization
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association released a statement on July 7 on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung was a peerlessly great man.
					
					 He will always live in the hearts of the world people.
					
					 He founded the Juche idea, guiding idea for human liberation.
					
					 He led the two revolutionary wars to victories and built a Korean-style socialist system under which the people have become master of everything and everything serves them.
					
					 He regarded believing in people as in Heaven as his motto, pursued genuine politics centered on the popular masses, enforced free education and free medical care and abolished all sorts of taxation.
					
					 This was a miracle in modern history.
					
					 He was always among the people, providing ceaseless field guidance. He made ceaseless journeys for the people even in the last period of his life.
					
					 He was an outstanding thinker and theoretician and philosopher who wrote many works.
					
					 He struggled against U.S.-led imperialism and made a great contribution to the peace and stability in the Asia and the rest of the world.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Highly Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Highly Praised Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- A Russian political party and organization and a regional organization posted special write-ups on their websites between July 5 and 7 on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation posted an article titled "President Kim Il Sung always lives like the sun" illustrated with his photo.
					
					 The article said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung made a great history of victory with his total dedication to the country and its people.
					
					 He was the tender-hearted father of the Korean people who brought the prosperity of the country after defeating U.S. and Japanese imperialisms.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il frustrated the moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK with the might of Songun and firmly defended socialism.
					
					 The great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il always live in the hearts of the Korean people and world progressives.
					
					 Today the history of the great men who are like the sun is given steady continuity thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Group for Solidarity with the DPRK posted on its website a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung, photos on his revolutionary activities and videos. It also posted articles under various titles accompanied with Korean songs including "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung".
					
					 The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions posted an article illustrated with art pieces depicting the President. The article said that his august name would be immortal with his great idea.
					
					 It stressed that Kim Jong Un would win a brilliant victory in the struggle to build a thriving nation of Juche, holding aloft the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Events Held Abroad to Mark War Victory Day
articles.content:
Events Held Abroad to Mark War Victory Day
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Denmark, the first meeting of a preparatory committee in the UK and round-table talks and film shows in Ethiopia between July 1 and 9 to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 Seen in the film shows were Korean films including "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation."
					
					 The chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association recalled that the army and people of the DPRK defeated the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world in the Fatherland Liberation War under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and firmly defended the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation.
					
					 He said that the DPRK was well known to the world as a country of heroes and the Korean people as a heroic people, adding that the exploits the President performed for bringing about a great victory in the war would shine forever with human history.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist) said that the U.S. imperialists applied all brutal methods and means to the war but could not bring to their knees the army and people of the DPRK led by Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The director of an Ethiopian hospital noted that Kim Il Sung was an invincible and iron-willed commander who brought about the great victory in the war ignited by the U.S., adding that the future of the DPRK is rosy as it is led by Marshal Kim Jong Un who is identical to Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in matchless grit and personality.
					
					 A message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Denmark.

articles.title: Exploits Performed by Kim Il Sung for Victory in War Praised
articles.content:
Exploits Performed by Kim Il Sung for Victory in War Praised
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Colorful events took place in different countries in the period between July 8 and 15 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 They included a meeting in Switzerland, round-table talks in Britain and Malaysia and Korean book and photo exhibitions in Peru and Ethiopia.
					
					 Displayed in the exhibitions were photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un dealing with their exploits.
					
					 Also on display there were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing the army and people of the DPRK in their efforts to build a thriving nation.
					
					 The chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee said that the Korean people were the first to win a victory in the struggle against the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Il Sung was an iron-willed commander and brilliant strategist who led the Fatherland Liberation War to a brilliant victory with Juche-oriented strategies and tactics.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists provoke a war again, the army and people of the DPRK will wipe out the aggressors to the last man and achieve the reunification of the country, holding Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un in high esteem.
					
					 The chairman of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain stressed that the Korean people have achieved a victory in the confrontation with the U.S. in the new century just as they did in the last century.
					
					 Speakers including the director of the M.K.P. Company of Malaysia said that the DPRK defeated the imperialist allied forces in the war which broke out in less than five years after its liberation from the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists. They noted it was the greatest miracle.
					
					 Personages including the chairman of the Peruvian preparatory committee for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War also highly praised the President for winning the victory in the war.
					
					 A message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Switzerland.

articles.title: Korean People's Victory in War Observed by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Korean People's Victory in War Observed by Foreign Papers
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried special write-ups to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The Egyptian paper Al Ahrar on July 8 carried an article under the title "Day of the victory of the Korean people" illustrated with a photo of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The paper said that the U.S. was compelled to sign the armistice agreement which was little short of a surrender paper on July 27, 1953.
					
					 When sighs and sorrows were growing in the U.S. due to the heavy defeat in the war, fireworks were displayed to celebrate the victory and victors broke into rousing cheers in the DPRK.
					
					 July 27 is recorded in the history as a day of victory for the Korean people as they defeated the U.S. which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world.
					
					 The July issue of the British paper Proletarian in an article titled "60th anniversary of victory in the Korean war" said that the DPRK had access to nuclear deterrent for self-defence to cope with the U.S. constant war threat. 
					
					 This is a powerful means to guarantee peace not only on the Korean Peninsula but also in the rest of Asia, it said.
					
					 The Cambodian newspaper Kmae Amata on July 10 carried an article under the title "Justice triumphs" illustrated with a photo of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The paper said that the nuclear deterrence of the DPRK is a means for just self-defense to cope with the U.S. evermore pronounced hostile policy and its nuclear threat and a treasured sword of justice for defending the sovereignty of the country and the nation and the world peace.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The world people who love justice and progress are supporting the Korean people who are struggling against the U.S. engrossed in high-handed and arbitrary practices and its allied forces.
					
					 The victory is in store for the Korean people all out to defend their sovereignty.
					
					 Justice is sure to triumph.

articles.title: International Solidarity Movement Supports DPRK
articles.content:
International Solidarity Movement Supports DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The month of anti-U.S. joint struggle has become an annual international movement since Juche 52 (1963), a decade after the Koreans' victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. It has since served as an occasion for strongly supporting the Korean people in their efforts to frustrate the heinous moves of the U.S. imperialists for stifling the DPRK, defend the sovereignty and dignity of the nation and reunify the country.
					 For the past five decades more than 6 300 letters, messages of greeting and messages were sent to the commanders of Mt. Paektu from every nook and corner of the world. At least 15 000 statements, appeals and resolutions and others were released in over 190 countries, over 20 000 solidarity events have been broadly conducted and over 11 000 media waged active media campaign.
					
					 The 3rd conference of the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity held in Tanzania in February, 1963 adopted a resolution on the DPRK with a unanimous approval.
					
					 The resolution underscored the need to positively support the withdrawal of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces from south Korea and the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea without interference of any foreign forces and decided to set the period from June 25, the day when the U.S. imperialists provoked the Korean war, to July 27, the 10th anniversary of the conclusion of the Korean Armistice Agreement, as the "month of joint struggle for withdrawal of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces from south Korea".
					
					 The struggle against the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the U.S. has since flared up like a prairie fire in every part of the world on the occasion of the first anniversary of the month.
					
					 The people's congress against the U.S. military presence in south Korea was held in Beijing and mass rallies took place with huge attendance in Tianjin, Changchun, Shenyang, Yanji and other places of China.
					
					 Messages and statements to the Korean people were continuously adopted at meetings, film shows and exhibitions held in Moscow, Havana, Ulan Bator and Warsaw and other countries.
					
					 The month has improved to be the international solidarity movement of mankind strongly supporting the DPRK winning victory after victory in the DPRK-U.S. confrontation.
					
					 As many as 400 million people participated in the international signature campaign for the denuclearization on the Korean Peninsula which was waged on a world-wide scale in the month of 1992.
					
					 458.03 million people of more than 520 political parties, organizations and international organizations and social circles in the world also participated in the international signature campaign which was carried on for nine months through the anti-U.S. joint struggle month from February, 2002, supporting the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and demanding the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea.
					
					 International courts were held in New York, Pyongyang and Lima in 2001, 2003 and 2004 to judge the criminal acts of the U.S. forces in the period of the Korean war.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for Celebrating 60th Anniversary of Victory in Korean War Inaugurated in Russia
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for Celebrating 60th Anniversary of Victory in Korean War Inaugurated in Russia
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War was inaugurated by the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation on Tuesday.
					 Gromov, first secretary of the territorial committee, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee set the July 16-30 celebration period and decided to organize colorful political and cultural events for introducing President Kim Il Sung's exploits in war victory and leader Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership exploits.
					
					 It decided to extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for building a thriving socialist nation and achieving national reunification.

articles.title: Chinese Website Discloses U.S. Germ Warfare in Korean War
articles.content:
Chinese Website Discloses U.S. Germ Warfare in Korean War
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The 4th Media News, a website of China, on July 11 carried an article titled "U.S. Used Germ Warfare during Korean War".
					  The article recalled that the U.S. imperialists committed germ warfare against the peace-loving civilians in the period of the Korean war, citing concrete data including the report made by the fact-finding group of the International Association of Democratic Lawyers released on March 31, 1952, documents available from the U.S. National Archives and confession by an officer of the U.S. Air Force who dropped germ bombs.
					
					 The article questioned who believes in the claim of the U.S. administration that the DPRK's assertions were "baseless" and "they were a disinformation campaign". 
					
					 It quoted Prof. Mori, Japanese famous scholar, as saying about the truth about the U.S. germ warfare:
					
					 "Use of germ weapons in war is in breach of the Geneva Convention. I think that's why the Americans are refusing to admit the allegations. But I have no doubt. I'm absolutely sure that this happened."

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion a rey belga
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion a rey belga
						
Pyongyang, 20 de julio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 20 un mensaje de felicitacion al rey de Belgica, Albert II con motivo del dia nacional de este pais.
					En su misiva el remitente formulo votos por la prosperidad de Belgica.

articles.title: Otorgada a Kim Il Sung Orden Conmemorativa de 60o aniversario de triunfo en Guerra
articles.content:
Otorgada a Kim Il Sung Orden Conmemorativa de 60o aniversario de triunfo en guerra
						
Pyongyang, 20 de julio (ACNC) -- Quedo publicado el dia 10 el decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de otorgar al Generalisimo Kim Il Sung la Orden Conmemorativa del 60o Aniversario del Triunfo en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria. 
					Segun el documento, el Presidente es el genial comandante de acero y heroe legendario quien condujo a la victoria la guerra por defender la libertad y la independencia de la patria. 
					
					Cuando estallo esa contienda antiyanqui, el  destacado estratega militar Kim Il Sung pronuncio un historico discurso radial para llamar a todo el ejercito y pueblo a la batalla de vida o muerte contra el imperialismo norteamericano, y en cada etapa y periodo de la guerra presento las originales estrategias, tacticas y metodos de combate y frustro la superioridad numerica y tecnica de los enemigos con la superioridad ideo-politica y estrategico-tactica. 
					
					Durante varios decenios despues de la guerra, el Presidente logro siempre victorias en la enconada confrontacion antiimperialista y antiyanqui y convirtio la patria en la potencia socialista independiente, autarquica y autodefensiva, enarbolando la bandera del Juche, la del Songun. 
					
					Reflejando la unanime voluntad y aspiracion de todo el ejercito y pueblo coreanos, el Presidium de la APS de la RPDC otorga al Generalisimo Kim Il Sung la Orden Conmemorativa del 60o Aniversario del Triunfo en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, con motivo del 60o aniversario del triunfo en la guerra.

articles.title: Otorgada a Kim Jong Il la Orden Conmemorativa del 60o aniversario de triunfo en Guerra
articles.content:
Otorgada a Kim Jong Il la Orden Conmemorativa del 60o aniversario de triunfo en guerra 
						
Pyongyang, 20 de julio (ACNC) -- Quedo publicado el dia 10 el decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de otorgar al Generalisimo Kim Jong Il la Orden Conmemorativa del 60o Aniversario del Triunfo en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					Segun el documento, el Generalisimo es el general del Songun del Paektu y patriota sin igual quien durante mas de medio siglo frustro con el poderio del Songun las maniobras de los reaccionarios imperialistas tendentes a aislar y atropellar a la RPDC e hizo brillar de siglo en sigo la historia y las tradiciones de victoria logradas en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria. 
					
					En su tierna edad de 10 anos aprendio la autoctona idea militar y los metodos de combate del Presidente Kim Il Sung ante la mesa de operaciones de la Comandancia Suprema.
					
					Y estando junto con el Presidente en el camino de direccion del Songun, fortalecio el Ejercito Popular de Corea como ejercito de lider y del partido que luche a riesgo de la vida por el Presidente y dirigio sabiamente la lucha por materializar la linea militar del partido. 
					
					Al definir la politica de Songun como principal modo politico socialista, preparo el remedio omnipotente para la defensa de la patria y la lucha antiimperialista y antiyanqui y creo relevantes milagros con los cuales logro sucesivamente los acontecimientos a ser registrados en letras mayusculas en la historia nacional de cinco milenios. 
					
					Reflejando la unanime voluntad y aspiracion de todo el ejercito y pueblo, el Presidium de la APS de la RPDC otorga al Generalisimo Kim Jong Il la Orden Conmemorativa del 60o Aniversario del Triunfo en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, con motivo del 60o aniversario del triunfo en la guerra.

articles.title: Reconstruido en Wonsan monumento a los martires del EPC
articles.content:
Reconstruido en Wonsan monumento a los martires del EPC
						
Pyongyang, 20 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 60o aniversario del triunfo del pueblo coreano en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, quedo reconstruido el monumento a los martires del Ejercito Popular de Corea, situado en la cima del monte Namsan de la ciudad de Wonsan de la provincia de Kangwon.
					El monumento esta compuesto de la torre, la jamba, las tumbas de martires, la plataforma de deposito de ofrendas florales, el sitio de educacion, etc.
					
					Saltan a la vista la insignia para la gorra del EPC, el fusil y la bandera roja descritos en la torre.
					
					Se edificaron los grupos escultoricos de fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas.
					
					En la jamba se ven las letras "1950", "25 de Junio", "1953" y "27 de Julio" y en el sitio de educacion esta levantada una lapida con la poesia escrita por el heroe Ri Su Bok "Por la unica patria".
					
					En el lugar reposan los restos mortales de los martires del EPC caidos heroicamente en la pasada guerra coreana.
